title.rendered: Cover Letters : More important than you think

content.rendered:
This short video will tell you exactly what a cover letter is about and how to follow some easy steps to writing a good solid cover letter to send out with your next resume.

<iframe loading="lazy" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/3WGn5t_xYek" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>
